data.lyric:
[ti:Youth]
[ar:Shawn Mendes/Khalid]
[al:Youth]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Youth - Shawn Mendes (肖恩·蒙德兹)/Khalid
[00:04.78]Written by：Khalid/Shawn Mendes
[00:09.57]Here I am stuck on this couch scrolling through my notes
[00:13.71]Heart was broken still not growing nah
[00:19.43]Waking up to headlines filled with devastation again
[00:23.34]My heart is broken but I keep going
[00:27.71]
[00:29.51]Pain but I won't let it turn into hate
[00:35.16]No I won't let it change me
[00:38.36]Never losing sight of the one I keep inside
[00:42.77]Now I know it yeah I know it
[00:46.88]
[00:47.83]You can't take my youth away
[00:50.34]This soul of mine will never break
[00:52.61]As long as I wake up today
[00:55.24]You can't take my youth away
[00:57.64]You can't take my youth away
[00:59.98]This soul of mine will never break
[01:02.29]As long as I wake up today
[01:04.87]You can't take my youth away
[01:06.73]You can't take my youth away
[01:09.50]It's hard to sleep at night knowing what's outside
[01:13.85]Feeling hopeless I need focus
[01:19.33]You hit me with words I never heard come out your mouth
[01:23.31]To be honest I don't want it no
[01:28.93]
[01:29.73]Pain but I won't let it turn into hate
[01:35.11]No I won't let it change me
[01:37.90]
[01:38.46]You can't take my youth away
[01:40.72]Soul of mine will never break
[01:43.07]As long as I wake up today

[01:47.98]You can't take my youth away
[01:50.39]Soul of mine will never break
[01:52.64]As long as I wake up today
[01:55.24]You can't take my youth away
[01:57.13]You can't take my youth away can't take my youth
[02:01.75]You can't take my youth away
[02:04.09]
[02:04.65]Oh yeah
[02:06.51]
[02:08.04]Pain but I won't let it turn into hate
[02:13.53]No I won't let it change me
[02:16.43]
[02:17.68]Pain but I won't let it turn into hate
[02:23.10]No I won't let it change me
[02:26.38]You can't take my youth away
[02:28.81]Soul of mine will never break
[02:31.07]As long as I wake up today
[02:33.54]You can't take my youth away youth away
[02:36.09]You can't take my youth away
[02:38.22]Soul of mine will never break
[02:40.60]As long as I wake up today

data.trans:
[ti:Youth]
[ar:Shawn Mendes/Khalid]
[al:Youth]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:04.78]//
[00:09.57]我窝在沙发里 翻阅着我的笔记
[00:13.71]心已碎掉 还未痊愈
[00:19.43]又一次被那头条中的灾难新闻惊醒
[00:23.34]我的心已碎掉 但仍要继续前行
[00:27.71]
[00:29.51]心痛不已 但我不会因爱生恨
[00:35.16]不 我不会让它改变我一丝一毫
[00:38.36]我永远不会忘记珍存心底的那个人
[00:42.77]此刻 我已明了
[00:46.88]
[00:47.83]你无法夺去我的青春年华
[00:50.34]我的灵魂永远不会分崩离析
[00:52.61]只要今天我还能醒来
[00:55.24]你就无法夺去我的青春年华
[00:57.64]你无法夺去我的青春年华
[00:59.98]我的灵魂永远不会分崩离析
[01:02.29]只要今天我还能醒来
[01:04.87]你就无法夺去我的青春年华
[01:06.73]你无法夺去我的青春年华
[01:09.50]夜里总是辗转难眠 对外边发生的一切心知肚明
[01:13.85]感觉如此无助 我需要集中精力
[01:19.33]你用那些我从未听你说过的狠话重伤了我
[01:23.31]老实说 我对此毫不渴望 不
[01:28.93]
[01:29.73]心痛不已 但我不会让这份伤痛化作憎恨
[01:35.11]不 我不会让它改变我一丝一毫
[01:37.90]
[01:38.46]你无法夺去我的青春年华
[01:40.72]我的灵魂永远不会分崩离析
[01:43.07]只要今天我还能醒来

[02:01.75]你无法夺去我的青春年华
